channel.title: Conferences on Foundries.io
channel.description: Recent content in Conferences on Foundries.io

item.title: ELC / Open IoT Summit 2018 Slides now available
item.description: Foundries.io presented 4 sessions at this year’s IoT Summit and Embedded Linux Conference and the slides are now available.

item.title: Foundries.io at Embedded World 2018
item.description: Foundries.io is excited to have an opportunity to demonstrate our end to end IoT microPlatforms at this years Embedded World conference in Nuremburg, Germany. The Embedded World conference takes place between February 27th-March 1st at the Embedded World conference Center. OSF will be presenting in the Zephyr booth, located in Hall 4, booth number: 4-680.

item.title: Foundries.io at ELC / Open IoT Summit 2018
item.description:
Foundries.io is excited to have an opportunity to demonstrate our end to end IoT microPlatforms at this years Embedded Linux Conference and the Open IoT Summit alongside the Zephry project.

This year, the events will take place in Portland Oregon, at the downtown Portland Hilton from March 12-15. Foundries.io will be presenting on 4 topics at this year’s IoT Summit.
